variable.name: gl_weather_rain
variable.description: Turns on rain out of doors, the density of rain is equal to whatever gl_weather_rain is set to. If you set gl_weather_rain_fast to 1, you can turn off all splashes, if you set it to 2, you will turn off only the water splashes. Works on all non-iD maps except death32c, dakyne and some others.
